statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); time=$(date +%H:%M:%S); model_id=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.id'); model_display=$(echo "$model_id" | sed -e 's/.*opus-4-1.*/Opus 4.1/' -e 's/.*sonnet.*/Sonnet/' -e 's/.*haiku.*/Haiku/' -e t -e 's/.*/Unknown/'); folder_icon=$(printf '\xef\x81\xbc'); printf "\033[2m%s  %s%s \033[0m\033[35m[%s]\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$folder_icon" "$(basename "$cwd")" "${git_branch:+ ($git_branch)}" "$model_display" "$time"
